level.heading: Annual statements; filing fee.
level.text: Each of such companies shall file an annual statement, in the form prescribed by the Superintendent, before March 1 of each year, of its operations for the year ending December 31 immediately preceding. Such statement shall be verified by oath of the president and secretary or in their absence by 2 other principal officers. The fee for filing said statement shall be $50 and payment thereof shall be collected by the Superintendent and made payable to the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-52
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-52, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2603.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 5-113
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-113, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2601.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Mayor authorized to issue rules: See notes to § 47-2601.
Department of Insurance abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2603.
